'''''I Saw Her Sable Skirts All Fringed With Light...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''.

To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete all 12 [[Nightsoul Totem]] challenges in Natlan at least once and open the chests awarded after completing the twelfth challenge.
